p.s: it was a pleasure receiving your letter and I feel honored you sent me one of your sonnets.
I think this sonnet has a special meaning.
It can be transferred to many different parts of life because the theme of transitoriness is present everywhere.
It made me think about my life and how I should enjoy it.
As all your sonnets it caused different emotions and let me doubt about my way of living before.
You made me understand that I want to live my youth before I wilt like the flower.
I think you should publish this sonnet because it could be an inspiration for everyone.
It can be interpreted differently in different times, at different places by different people and become inspiration to completlycompletely new works of art.
Maybe in the future the people will love your work too and turn it into something completlycompletely new.
I think what you are doing is art and you should not keep your talent a secret.
I hope you are taking my advice and think about publishing them.
